properties.name: anaf.api.base.url
properties.description: The base url for the Anaf api. Used for rest requests with an OAuth2 access token as authentication.

properties.name: cron.reported-invoice.check-state
properties.description: A cron expression specifying how often you want to check the ANAF server for the status of reported Invoices

properties.name: anaf.request.sleep-delay.seconds
properties.description: Value in seconds to sleep between consecutive ANAF requests

properties.name: cron.received-message.find-new
properties.description: A cron expression specifying how often you want to check the ANAF server for new received messages (second, minute, hour, day of month, month, day(s) of week)
